translations: n.[解剖] 小体；[光] 微粒；血球

sentences.sentence: Each corpuscle singing in its capillary hates you.
sentences.translation: 在毛细血管里欢歌的血球恨你。

sentences.sentence: The nanometre corpuscle or nanometre material has its own special properties and new rules.
sentences.translation: 纳米微粒及纳米材料具有独特的性质和新的规律。
